name: The Hei$t
description:
Two thieves are trying to rob the bank. Try to find the key to the safe, but remember to avoid cameras and guards. Good luck!

Interact with buttons to disable some cameras for limited time, find the key to unlock the safe and steal the money.

You can carry bodies of the guards, and leave them in the toilet. 

Both of you need to escape by the window in order to win the game.

Game created for Quad Jam Summer in 48h. 

Code - Bartosz Ciechanowski

Art - Paulina Guździoł
